title: Brane Variation Dirac Style
abstract: Dirac prescription for dealing with brane dynamics invokes a rest frame formulation of the 'sandwich' brane action. We demonstrate this method by first pedagogically re-deriving Snell law. Applying the method to a general N-dim brane evolving in some (N+1)-dim background, the resulting equations of motion are: (i) Israel continuity condition, (ii) Energy/momentum conservation on the brane, and (iii) Geodetic-type equation for the brane. Remarkably, the last two equations survive even when the bulk gravitational coupling is switched off. Special attention is drawn to the Regge-Teitelboim and Randall-Sundrum cases.
